name: Pandesoft Mega Mix 2022
description:
To celebrate the new year we've put together our games from 2022 together in a big, mega folder! 

This bundle includes:

Kari-Kari Kincho

"A city destruction game, featuring Kincho, a nervous shrimp kaiju, hoping his life doesn't come to a tempura fried end!

Created from the minds of JoshJayOnline and Pandesoft for KaijuJam 2022!"

...

Exposure_Therapy:

"Set in an alternate universe, where Ethan WInters struggles with PTSD after the events in the Village. The village is a wreckage of what it used to be. No more lycans and no more lords to hurt Ethan or take Rose. Chris helps Ethan on a journey of exposure therapy, going back to the village with no weapons, and no fear.

Controls :

Spacebar to progress dialogue.

Click the "END" button to show the end screen."

...

Leave it, Brie

Play as Doctor Colby Brie, a vigilante God hunter who's found their last target in an abandoned house. 

Controls : 

Left Click or Spacebar to progress dialogue.

Special thanks to my favorite Eldritch horror,  Statia, who made the music, crafted the story and gave us lots of support along the way! <3

Submission to the Cosmic Horror Jam 2022 hosted by Dungeon. 

...

We look forward to making new, exciting experiences during 2023! Thank you for your support, and special thanks to our partner Statia for supporting us all throughout the year and in our daily life! You continue to inspire us! Thank you to JoshJayOnline, we really learned a lot from working with you on our first game jam together, and got a lot of experience from it! And a last thank you to Dungeon for creating some wonderful game jams! They always give us the craziest ideas! We look forward to any jams you host in 2023!
